question: After the cessation of the great revolt of 1857, who of the following was exiled by the British in Rangoon?
explanation: Bahadur Shah Zafar was exiled by the British in Rangoon after the revolt of 1857. He was captured from Humayun\'s Tomb by the British force led by Major William Hodson on 20th September 1857. In the year 1862, he died.
